abstract.para: Since developing an easily installable and usable distribution is among our main goals, the Human-Computer Interaction project is among our foremost projects.

sect1.para:
Within the scope of Uludag Human-Computer Interaction Project:
The paper mock-ups for the applications, systems, etc. will be designed and built, The usability tests will be carried out, usability reports will be written, Usability and HCI support will be provided to other project, Installer, Configuration Tools and Graphics & Media projects being at the forefront, The usability and HCI guidelines for the distribution will be determined, a usability manual will be prepared, The usability and HCI tests for the contributed applications will be carried out, the relevant process will be defined and a manual will be prepared.
Project contact: Ayşe Genç, ayse@uludag.org.tr
